name: Imagination Practice
description:
In this activity, you imagine letters around your body and think of words which contain or start with those letters. It really activates the brain dramatically!

There is also a gentle body movement aspect of this puzzle game, because you can point around your body using the gestures and locations that your avatar in the game is making.

Contents:
1) The first section of the game trains you in the gestures the avatar is making so you know what those gestures mean.

2) The second section of the game is the actual imagination practice where you visualize the numbers, letters, and shapes around your body which stimulates your imagination to remember words and information which contains those letters and numbers.

This app is particularly useful like a solitaire game when you want to stimulate thinking about your life and circumstances but want less effort than reading a deep book.

It is very easy to use and gives good mental stimulation.
